members.name: Mitchell Reed
members.bio: Mitchell Reed leads the Hickory High School Band Program with passion and dedication, guiding students to excellence in musical performance.

members.name: Yvonne Daye
members.bio: Yvonne Daye brings expertise and dedication to the Hickory High School Band Program, working alongside the team to develop exceptional musical talent.

members.name: Derek Johnson
members.bio: Derek Johnson supports the band program with expertise in musical instruction and student development, helping to guide students toward musical excellence.

members.name: Aubrey Horstman
members.bio: Aubrey Horstman contributes to the success of the Hickory High School Band Program through dedicated instruction and mentorship of student musicians.
